formalpara.title: Figure 2. Bulk segregant analysis of C. briggsae SNPs
formalpara.para: Sequence traces from C. briggsae strains a) AF16 and b) HK104, showing an A/T polymorphisms. Sequence traces from lysates made from c) a mixture of five AF16 and five HK104 hermaphrodites and d) one AF16 hermaphrodite and nine HK104 hermaphrodites.
